pr_title: Fix error while querying for structural variants

timeline.message: Fix error while querying for structural variants
Fix error while querying for structural variants

timeline.bodyText: I noticed that UniqueKeyBase implements Serializable, probably don't have to reimplement here.
timeline.author: n1zea144
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -29,8 +29,6 @@
 public class StructuralVariant extends UniqueKeyBase implements Serializable{

timeline.bodyText: When a fusion is carried within a mutation record, the protein change contains the SV event.
timeline.author: n1zea144

replies.bodyText: Not sure if it's a SV event but the protein change is SV. Here is an example https://www.cbioportal.org/patient?studyId=nbl_broad_2013&caseId=TARGET-30-PANRRW
replies.author: kalletlak

replies.bodyText: I checked, its over here ImportFusionData
replies.author: n1zea144

timeline.bodyText: Is this when a gene symbol is not found?  Should we note that site2 is not being set here?
timeline.author: n1zea144

replies.bodyText: Yes. I'll add a comment here
replies.author: kalletlak

replies.bodyText: This will go away once we move to a more structured SV format.
replies.author: n1zea144
